title: Leaverbuster affect my honor level ?
body: Leavet buster affect my honor level ?

replies.body: i hope not casue i got 2 lbs in a row due to riots bugs
Im still Honor lv2 and dont know what to do. Im playing supp and i get honored almost every game and still dont lv up
You have to be honoured by more than one pearson

I can't find the quote but a Rioter said (on Reddit I think) they made it specifically so that Leavebuster penalties don't affect your honor level because it's impossible to know if leaving the game was made willingly or not.

The main thing that will affect your [**Honor level**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) is penalties. Getting reported or getting chat restrictions can drop your Honor level and even lock it at that level until you've shown reform.
